div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 268 Athens (near Hephaisteion), 1949 Burial: c. 150-140 B.C. (T) Contents: 41+ AE Athens: 40 New Style (as Svoronos pl. 22, 53-8 [10]; pl. 81, 17 [2]; 18 [6]; 28 [5]; 30 [2]; 20 [4]; 23 [2]; 33 [7]; 2 very worn fulminating Zeus unc. symbols) 1 "Delian" type (as Sv. pl. 106, 1-7 Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1950, p. 292 (no details) Types recorded by Thompson in 1960's See no. 269 below
